subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: It is thought to descend from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*tsil||fat, grease}}, although the initial does not match the one of the Old Chinese reconstruction ({{zh-ref|Matisoff, STEDT}}; {{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
